title: Takeoff, of Atlanta Rap Trio Migos, Shot Dead at 28 in Houston
description: The rapper was killed in a shooting at a bowling alley in Houston overnight.
dc:creator: Joe Coscarelli and J. David Goodman
media:credit: Rich Fury/Getty Images For Global Citizen
media:description: Takeoff during a Migos performance in Los Angeles last year. The rapper was fatally shot in Houston early Tuesday morning.
